weekly_top_story.headline: Congressional Stalemate Creates Chaos For Obamacare Shoppers
weekly_top_story.summary: The fate of enhanced premium tax credits for Affordable Care Act enrollees remains uncertain, threatening significantly higher premiums and coverage disruptions for millions as open enrollment begins.

stories.headline: Open Enrollment begins today on Healthcare.gov. Here's what you should know
stories.summary: Millions of Americans face potentially much higher premiums this year as enhanced ACA subsidies expire, creating uncertainty for patients and providers alike.

stories.headline: Louisiana Took Months To Sound Alarm After Two Babies Died In Whooping Cough Outbreak
stories.summary: Louisiana public health officials delayed alerting the public during a severe whooping cough outbreak, raising concerns about transparency and disease control practices.

stories.headline: SNAP Payments Cut in Half Amid Federal Funding Expiration
stories.summary: Federal funding for SNAP expired, resulting in reduced payments for half of households, which may impact health outcomes and increase demand for safety-net services.
